search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Snov.io (snovio.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for the Snov.io pricing page is: [https://snov.io/pricing](https://snov.io/pricing) .

A/B testing

Engagement notifications

Mailbox rotation

Custom tracking domain

Personalization variables

New recipients volume control

Follow-up priority option

Spintax

If/then dynamic content

Data export

LinkedIn Automation

$69 per account slot

Built-in location based proxy

IP location change

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes a variety of features and usage-based credits for email finding and verification.
